title: Sun-Kissed Glamour in Greece
description: Experience a stylish European seaside escape in Greece with four nights at the sun kissed Thalatta Seaside Hotel. Includes return airport transfers from Athens (a 2.5 hour drive away), daily buffet breakfasts, nightly buffet dinners, a three-course ‘Flavours of Greece’ lunch and more.
offer_address: Agia Anna Beach, Ayia Anna 340 10, Greece

title: Beachside Glamour in the Greek Islands
description: Uncover the secrets of the locals' favourite Greek island of Andros with four nights at the beachfront Aegea Blue Cycladic Resort. Includes return ferry port transfers, welcome drinks, daily breakfasts, nightly three-course Mediterranean dinners, a three-course ‘Flavours of Greece’ lunch and more for two adults.
offer_address: Zorgos Beach, Andros Island, Cyclades 845 01, Greece
